DOC.detailed_description: Schizophrenia severely disable brain disorder . People schizophrenia often experience hallucination , delusion , think disorder , movement disorder . Medications available alleviate symptom schizophrenia , many cause undesirable side effect . For example , two early second generation antipsychotic , olanzapine risperidone , show effective treat schizophrenia symptom , cause rapid , substantial weight gain . There low risk side effect newer second generation antipsychotic , aripiprazole . Little known , however , effectiveness new medication treat people first-episode schizophrenia . This study evaluate effectiveness aripiprazole versus risperidone treatment first-episode schizophrenia . Participants double-blind study randomly assign receive either aripiprazole risperidone 12 week . Subjects meet response criterion continue initial blind antipsychotic additional 4 week total length 16 week treatment . Subjects meet response criterion week 16 continue successful blind medication remain time study . Patients respond treat medication ( aripiprazole risperidone ) receive first 16 week study . The second antipsychotic trial last 16 week . Patients respond switch phase continue successful medication remain time study . Patients respond second medication trial treat open-label clozapine 20 week . Safety monitor clozapine-treated subject follow establish procedure multi-episode patient ( e.g . weekly complete blood count ( CBC ) monitoring ) . The total length patient participation 52 week . During longitudinal follow-up phase , subject may prescribe open-label sodium valproate manic symptom open-label sertraline symptom depression anxiety empirically responsive ( Selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ) SSRI treatment . Additionally , participant take part Healthy Lifestyles program aim prevent weight gain . The Healthy Lifestyles program provide psycho-education , supportive psychotherapy , medication adherence counseling . At visit , treatment metabolic outcome assess . Participants meet psychiatrist , evaluate progress medication dosage , social worker , administer Healthy Lifestyles Program . Upon completion study , participant receive follow-up care clinical staff member part research team . For information relate study , please follow link : http : //clinicaltrials.gov/show/NCT00000374
